metadata.feature_description: Tests that the AccountSettings UI loads and displays correctly

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify HTML template loads without errors

steps.action: Navigate to direct URL of AccountSettings.html
steps.expected: HTML template should load without errors

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Check 'Hello World, This is Site Settings.' text displays

steps.action: Verify H2 heading text in loaded HTML
steps.expected: Text 'Hello World, This is Site Settings.' should be displayed
steps.actual: H2 heading displays 'Hello World, This is Site Settings.' as expected

steps.action: Check for Save button element in HTML
steps.expected: Save button should be present with class 'primarybtn'
steps.actual: Save button present as anchor element with class 'primarybtn' and text 'Save'

steps.expected: JavaScript file should be accessible and contain init function
steps.actual: JavaScript file loaded successfully with proper RequireJS/AMD module containing init function

steps.action: Examine JavaScript module for load function
steps.expected: Module should export a load function
steps.actual: Module exports load function that accepts params and callback parameters

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Check extensions div container is present

steps.expected: Div with id 'tabs-extensions' and class 'personabar-extensions' should be present
steps.actual: Div element found with id='tabs-extensions' and class='personabar-extensions'

steps.action: Check JavaScript file for proper AMD define() syntax
steps.expected: Module should use define() with dependencies and export functions
steps.actual: Module uses define(['jquery', 'main/extension'], function...) syntax correctly and exports init/load functions

steps.action: Login and click on nav_Accounts menu item in PersonaBar
steps.expected: AccountSettings panel should open with 'Hello World' content
steps.actual: Clicking nav_Accounts opens Site Settings panel instead of AccountSettings panel

issues: PersonaBar menu integration issue: clicking nav_Accounts opens Site Settings panel instead of AccountSettings
The module HTML/JS files exist and work correctly when accessed directly, but the PersonaBar routing/configuration is incorrect

observations: The AccountSettings module files are correctly deployed to DesktopModules/admin/Dnn.PersonaBar/Modules/Evoq.Accounts/
HTML template loads correctly when accessed via direct URL
JavaScript module uses proper RequireJS/AMD format with init and load functions
The nav_Accounts menu item is visible in the PersonaBar but clicking it opens Site Settings instead of AccountSettings
This appears to be a PersonaBar menu routing/configuration issue rather than a problem with the module files themselves
Initial attempt to access HTML at admin/personaBar/AccountSettings.html path returned 404 - correct path is directly in module root
